articles.title: Federico Acosta y Lara
articles.contents:
Federico Acosta y Lara
          
          
          Home
          About
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Federico Acosta y Lara
          
          
            
              I got my B.A. in Political Science in UdelaR (Uruguay)
              in 2020 and a diploma in economics in 2021. Currenly, I am
              pursuing an M.A. degree in the same institution and I am
              working on ideological derives of right-wing parties
              during the Left Turn in Latin America. In a nutshell, my
              interest relay on the field of comparative politics,
              political economy and quantitative methodology. You can
              find my published work, links to replication data and
              code, and some other stuff on this site.
            
            
              I got my B.A. in Political Science in UdelaR (Uruguay)
